mapper.insert: insert into tbl_member (memberId, memberName, memberPw, gender, address, addressDetail) values(#{memberId}, #{memberName}, #{memberPw}, #{gender}, #{address}, #{addressDetail})
mapper.select: select count(memberId) from tbl_member where memberId = #{memberId}
select memberNum from tbl_member where memberId = #{memberId} and memberPw = #{memberPw}
select memberNum, memberId, memberName, gender, address, addressDetail from tbl_member where memberNum = #{memberNum}
select memberNum, memberId, memberName, gender, address, addressDetail from tbl_member
